name: Big Wreck
description: Big Wreck is the ndica-dominant cross of Big Bud and Trainwreck. This chunky combination offers functional relaxation with an uplifted mental buzz that some might describe as creative. This strain becomes very sedative with continuous use and may also stimulate your appetite.Â
attributes_title: Euphoric, Relaxed, Uplifted, Tingly, Happy, Stress, Insomnia, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
